metadata.name: High Potency Multivitamins Minerals Caplets 400 mcg Capsule

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Stannous chloride is a component of technetium 99m agents indicated for imaging of the skeleton for areas of altered osteogenesis or in the detection of infarcted heart tissue FDA Label

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Stannous chloride itself is not known to produce a pharmacological effect at the dosages used clinically
